title: Mating Urge
description: **Previously published in the Love Without Boundaries anthology. If you have that book please do not repurchase**Desperate to escape her stepfather and false criminal charges, Elliana Cage needed a way out fast. It made perfect sense to sneak onboard the first ship departing her home world. When her path crosses with a handsome stranger, sheâ€™s in for the surprise of her life.Aran T'Kar didn't expect to discover a beautiful woman hiding out on the Zanian IX. Protocol dictates immediate detainment, but Aran can't resist the urge to take one forbidden taste.
author: Michelle Howard
